column4: snake  sudo dpkg -P --force-all qmail ;sudo apt-get install -f
dpkg - warning: ignoring request to remove qmail which isn't installed.
i have only ubuntu repos. this problem occured since the time i tried to install something else. i removed those repos but the problem remained
i did something else. i added the repository that had qmail. i removed qmail and some other packages that were there and i removed the repository again. now everything is ok. thank you
